correct_order: Mayoral control of schools can be effective.
Mayor-controlled districts have seen improved student achievement across all subjects and student groups.
Moving to a mayor-led district can also help spur innovation and advancement.
In cities with lagging student achievement, getting more engagement from mayors or increasing their authority over schools could be part of the solution.
